name: KL Heritage - Walking tour
description: A unique walking tour of the heritage precinct in the city. View the Sri Maha Mariamman Hindu Temple - built in a unique human-like shape. Stroll past the old Victoria's Jubilee Fund Building (1887). Next in sight is the Chan See Shu Yuen Association which was constructed in 1906 - a fine example of old Chinese temple architecture. The walk ends at the bustling Chinatown street market where bargain hunters can find items of every description and quality.
